mapper.update: update user set `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `role` = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_desc = #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sgnature = #{userSgnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_picture_id = #{headPictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picture_id = #{pictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select stu_id, `password`, user_name, group_id, `role`, user_desc, user_sgnature, head_picture_id, picture_id from user where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
